name: haunted-agents-marketplace
description: A skeleton template for building agent marketplaces - Kiroween Hackathon Skeleton Crew submission

scripts.build:all: npm run build:cli && npm run build:web
scripts.dev:app1: node scripts/copy-config.js app1 && cd skeleton/web && npm run dev -- --port 4000
scripts.dev:app2: node scripts/copy-config.js app2 && cd skeleton/web && npm run dev -- --port 4001
scripts.dev:both: npm run dev:app1 & npm run dev:app2

author: Haunted Agents Team
